main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.globalsettings

Class GlobalSetting<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.globalsettings.GlobalSetting<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Setting's value type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoolGlobalSetting, StringGlobalSetting

    public abstract class GlobalSetting<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a setting valid for the whole of EMU, regardless of which UI is loaded.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps
